mapper.insert: insert into member ( member_original_id, member_email, member_password, member_refresh_token, member_role, member_is_delete ) VALUES ( #{memberOriginalId}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberPassword}, null, #{memberRole}, #{memberIsDelete} )
mapper.select: select member_original_id, member_email, member_password, member_is_delete, member_role from member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_role = 'USER';
select member_original_id, member_email, member_role from member where member_refresh_token = #{memberRefreshToken};
